title: Understanding Psychological Factors
text: Consider the various aspects of a person's internal environment that can influence their psychological state.

title: Emotional Influence
text: Think about how emotions can play a role in shaping a person's psychological self.

title: Coping Ability
text: Consider how a person's ability to cope with stress and challenges can affect their psychological well-being.

title: Spirituality and Self-Concept
text: Reflect on how spirituality and self-concept contribute to a person's psychological self.

title: Learned Behaviors
text: Think about how learned and conditioned behaviors can influence a person's psychological state.

title: Personality Traits
text: Consider how personality traits are a part of a person's psychological self.

hintAnswer: emotions, coping ability, spirituality, $$self-concept$$ and $$self-esteem$$, learned and conditioned behaviors, and personality traits
title: Identifying Psychological Factors
text: List the factors that affect a person's psychological self.
